Sentencas: In this paper the integrated process of biomass gasification and a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) was studied in terms of thermodynamics.
Titulo: From biomass to electricity through integrated gasification/SOFC system-optimization and energy balance

Sentencas: The study is based on an ongoing project intending to develop an innovative sustainable technology with high efficiency.
Titulo: From biomass to electricity through integrated gasification/SOFC system-optimization and energy balance

Sentencas: According to some assumptions, the energy balance revealed that the process can be auto-thermal.
Titulo: From biomass to electricity through integrated gasification/SOFC system-optimization and energy balance

Sentencas: Furthermore, and due to the utilization of the hydrogen content of steam utilized in the reforming stage, the overall efficiencies to electrical power could reach very high levels.
Titulo: From biomass to electricity through integrated gasification/SOFC system-optimization and energy balance
